Read a MODFLOW river file

Source: R/package-riv.R
rmf_read_riv.Rd

rmf_read_riv reads in a MODFLOW river file and returns it as an RMODFLOW riv object.

rmf_read_riv(
  file = {     cat("Please select river file ...\n")     file.choose() },
  dis = {     cat("Please select corresponding dis file ...\n")    
    rmf_read_dis(file.choose()) },
  ...
)

Arguments

file

filename; typically '*.riv'
dis

an RMODFLOW dis object
...

arguments passed to rmfi_parse_variables and rmfi_parse_list.

Value

RMODFLOW riv object

See also

rmf_write_riv, rmf_create_riv, https://water.usgs.gov/ogw/modflow/MODFLOW-2005-Guide/index.html?riv.htm
